title: Heavy Snowfall Delights Skiers In The Alps, Snarls Traffic
teaser: A major snow storm in the Alps over the weekend trapped skiers and vacationers.  According to officials, as many as 37,000 vehicles were stuck Saturday night in the Savoie region of the Alps.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
